activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#2298
activity.text:
I think everything works fine with backend and frontend, there might be an issue with celery, redis, or email configuration in deployment.  
- an example Log that celery gave as mail output while testing:

```
/bin/sh: 1: /usr/bin/google-chrome-stable: not found

[2022-05-11 18:51:39,662: WARNING/ForkPoolWorker-4] Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="===============1608515035946104170=="

MIME-Version: 1.0

Subject: Patient Discharge Summary

From: Coronasafe network <care@coronasafe.network>

To: marmikpatel250@gmail.com

Date: Wed, 11 May 2022 13:21:39 -0000

Message-ID: <165227529966.20.13104182714356782510@63d8167dd5ba>


--===============1608515035946104170==

Content-Type: text/html; charset="utf-8"

MIME-Version: 1.0

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit


Please find the attached file

--===============1608515035946104170==

Content-Type: application/pdf

MIME-Version: 1.0

Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64

Content-Disposition: attachment;

 filename="Srinivas Ramanujan-Discharge_Summary.pdf"



--===============1608515035946104170==--

[2022-05-11 18:51:39,663: WARNING/ForkPoolWorker-4] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[2022-05-11 18:51:39,664: INFO/ForkPoolWorker-4] Task care.facility.tasks.patient.discharge_report.generate_discharge_report[bd1ba65f-2148-4159-be73-b525466e40f9] succeeded in 5.204375585999969s: None
```
